property.name: hive.query.string
property.value: INSERT OVERWRITE DIRECTORY '/user/bi_etl/flow3_tmp/ID2218_2016-12-09-23-56-40' select GetTimestampFmt(date_id),hour_id,min_id,date_time_id,uv,pltfm_lv1_id,updt_time from rpt.rpt_rt_uv_min where ds = '2016-12-09' AND hour = '23'

property.name: mapreduce.workflow.name
property.value: INSERT OVERWRITE DIRECTORY '/user/bi_etl/flow3_tmp/ID2218_2016-12-09-23-56-40' select GetTimestampFmt(date_id),hour_id,min_id,date_time_id,uv,pltfm_lv1_id,updt_time from rpt.rpt_rt_uv_min where ds = '2016-12-09' AND hour = '23'
